title: Redeeming Rhys
description: Are people born pure?Is evil learned, or is it birthed into one's soul, like a fallen angel who was previously part of graciousness?Rhys is decayed, black, and bad. He cut distortion out of his life years before, but he let her live; his only way to gain redemption once more.As his sinful needs blanket him with dread, he seeks penance from the soul he saw as a second chance.Is absolution too late for Rhys?**Warning, dark scenes depicted heavily throughout this novel. Read the Author's disclaimer carefully before proceeding with this title.**
author: Mary E. Palmerin
